# IDE-specific user settings
*.user
*.suo
*.sdf
*.cache
*.log
.vs/

# Build output
bin/
obj/

# Environment variables and secrets
.env
*.key
*.pem
*.crt
*.p12
*.pfx
*.secret
*.config

# OS-generated files
Thumbs.db
.DS_Store

# Backup and temp files
*.bak
*.tmp
*.swp

# Credential storage
credentials.json
auth.json
secrets.json
